thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Xinjiang Sayram Modern Agriculture to swing to profit in FY 2017

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Xinjiang Sayram Modern Agriculture to swing to profit in FY 2017

organizations.name: reuters) - xinjiang sayram modern agriculture co ltd

text:
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Xinjiang Sayram Modern Agriculture Co Ltd :
* Sees to swing to net profit at 9 million yuan to 13 million yuan in FY 2017 versus net loss at 473.8 million yuan year ago
* Says improvement of main business, and increased sales of main products as main reasons for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/QbzJ3y
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
